tuv.seg: National Intellectual Disability Database
An Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Intleachta
The National Intellectual Disability Database is a database of information about people who are receiving intellectual disability services in Ireland or who are in need of these services
Bunachar sonraí faisnéise faoi dhaoine a bhfuil seirbhísí um míchumas intleachta á bhfáil acu in Éirinn nó a dteastaíonn na seirbhísí seo uathu, atá sa Bhunachar Náisiúnta um Míchumas Intleachta
The objective of the database is to ensure that accurate information is available about the needs of people with intellectual disabilities
Is é cuspóir an bhunachair seo a chinntiú go bhfuil faisnéis chruinn ar fáil faoi riachtanais daoine atá faoi mhíchumas intleachta
Services are planned and co-ordinated on the basis of the information contained in the database
Déantar seirbhísí a phleanáil agus a chomhordú ar bhonn na faisnéise a chuimsítear sa bhunachar sonraí seo
There is also a National Physical and Sensory Disability Database
Anuas air sin, tá Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Fisiciúil agus Céadfach ann chomh maith
The information on the database is gathered by service providers who are in contact with people with intellectual disabilities
Bailíonn soláthraithe seirbhíse an fhaisnéis ar an mbunachar sonraí a dhéanann teagmháil le daoine atá faoi mhíchumas intleachta
For example, Local Health Offices, voluntary bodies, and school principals
Mar shampla, Oifigí Sláinte Áitiúla, comhlachtaí deonacha, agus príomhoidí scoile
The information is given to Health Service Executive Local Health Offices
Tugtar an fhaisnéis d’Oifigí Sláinte Áitiúla Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte
The information is collected at national level, without any personal details such as name or address, and it is analysed by the Health Research Board
Bailítear an fhaisnéis ar leibhéal náisiúnta, gan aon sonraí pearsanta a bhailiú, ar nós ainm nó seolta, agus déanann an Bord Taighde Sláinte anailís uirthi
The statistical information is used to monitor current service provision and to predict future service requirements
Úsáidtear an fhaisnéis staitistiúil chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar sholáthar reatha seirbhíse agus chun riachtanais seirbhíse amach anseo a thuar
Access to the database
Rochtain ar an mbunachar sonraí
If there are details about you on the database, these details may be accessed by:
Má tá sonraí ann fút ar an mbunachar sonraí, féadfaidh na daoine a leanas na sonraí a rochtain:
• You (or, for a child, by the parents or guardians)
• Tú féin (nó, i gcás linbh, na tuismitheoirí nó na caomhnóirí)
• By a small number of people working for your service provider and/or your Local Health Office
• Líon beag daoine a oibríonn le do sholáthraí seirbhíse agus/nó d’Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil
The statistical information from the database, that is, information that does not identify any individual person is available to:
Tá an fhaisnéis staitistiúil ón mbunachar sonraí, is é sin, an fhaisnéis nach ndéanann aon duine aonair a shainaithint, ar fáil ag:
• The Health Research Board
• An Bord Taighde Sláinte
A National Database Committee considers requests for access to statistical information from the database and where it is appropriate, makes this information available
Déanann Coiste Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta breithniú ar iarratais ar rochtain ar fhaisnéis staitistiúil ón mbunachar sonraí agus sa chás gur cuí, cuireann siad an fhaisnéis seo ar fáil
The National Intellectual Disability Database Committee issues an Annual Report each year containing information on the current level of service provision
Eisíonn Coiste Náisiúnta an Bhunachair Shonraí um Míchumas Intleachta Tuarascáil Bhliantúil gach bliain ina gcuimsítear faisnéis ar an leibhéal reatha de sholáthar seirbhíse
The Data Protection Act, 1988 and the Data Protection (Amendment) Act 2003 applies in the normal way to information on this database
Cuirtear an tAcht um Chosaint Sonraí, 1988 agus an tAcht um Chosaint Sonraí (Leasú), 2003 i bhfeidhm ar an ngnáthbhealach i dtaobh faisnéise atá ar an mbunachar sonraí seo
This means, in summary, that you (or your parent or guardian if you are a child) have a right to:
Ciallaíonn seo, go hachomair, go bhfuil sé de cheart agat (nó ag do thuismitheoir nó caomhnóir, más leanbh thú):
• Get a copy of the information held about you on the database
• Cóip a fháil den fhaisnéis a choimeádtar fút ar an mbunachar sonraí
You can do this by contacting the Database Co-ordinator in your Local Health Office
Féadfaidh tú seo a dhéanamh trí theagmháil a dhéanamh le Comhordaitheoir an Bhunachair Shonraí i d’Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil
• Have any inaccurate information corrected or removed
• Aon fhaisnéis mhíchruinn fút a cheartú nó a bhaint
• Complain to the Data Protection Commissioner if your rights are not respected
• Gearán a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisinéir Cosanta Sonraí mura léirítear meas ar do chearta
If you have any questions about the National Intellectual Disability Database contact the Disability Office in your Local Health Office
Má bhraitheann tú go bhfuil faisnéis mhíchruinn á coimeád fút, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisinéir Cosanta Sonraí
